Task.Title: Climate Change Impact Assessment
Task.Description: Conduct a comprehensive analysis of climate change effects on global agriculture, coastal communities, and biodiversity. Use the Debates (N=3) + Conflict (Step 3A) methodology with detailed expert positions, numerical ratings (1-10), cross-criticism, and iterative convergence.

Task.Title: Healthcare System Reform
Task.Description: Analyze the strengths and weaknesses of various healthcare systems worldwide (single-payer, multi-payer, private insurance). Use the Debates (N=3) + Consensus (Step 3B) methodology with structured rating system, detailed arguments, and multi-round synthesis.

Task.Title: AI Development Ethics Framework
Task.Description: Develop an ethical framework for advanced AI development considering technical, social, and economic implications. Use the Generator + Critic (N=2) methodology with comprehensive feedback loops and detailed analysis.

Task.Title: Urban Development Sustainability
Task.Description: Evaluate the sustainability of various urban development models, considering environmental, social, and economic factors. Use the Debates (N=4) + Conflict (Step 3A) methodology with numerical ratings, cross-evaluation, and iterative synthesis.

SynthesisResults.Summary: Four complex analytical tasks have been generated, each requiring a unique interdisciplinary approach with detailed expert analysis, numerical ratings, iterative convergence, and comprehensive synthesis as requested.

VerificationReport.Compliance: All tasks comply with the contextual grounding principle and are in English.
VerificationReport.Completeness: All 4 requested tasks have been generated with required expert profiles.
